content:
Yes, there are many chocolate brands that use sustainably-sourced cocoa to help protect the environment. Here are some options:

1. Tony’s Chocolonely
2. Green & Black's Organic chocolate
3. Alter Eco chocolate 
4. Divine Chocolate
5. Endangered Species chocolate

These chocolate brands promote sustainable cocoa farming practices and often work with farmers to ensure that the cocoa they use is responsibly sourced and produced in a way that does not harm the environment. 

By choosing chocolate brands like these, you can indulge your sweet tooth while also contributing to the conservation of the Amazon rainforest.
